Question: PhysioFlow/Manatec Biomedical CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
PhysioFlow/Manatec Biomedical

PhysioFlow CES 2024

- Latest Advances in Cardiac Output Monitoring from High-Definition Impedance Cardiography
- Provides key measures of central systolic and diastolic and peripheral vascular function
- Monitors heart rate, stroke volume, cardiac output, stroke volume index, cardiac index, ventricular ejection time, contractility index, ejection fraction, left cardiac work index, end diastolic volume, early diastolic filling ratio, systemic vascular resistance, and systemic vascular resistance index continuously
- Intrarater reliability and agreement assessed during rest, submaximal exercise, and high-intensity interval exercise
- Heart rate, stroke volume, cardiac output, left cardiac work index, and end diastolic volume demonstrated a good level of reliability across activity types and intensities
- Other variables measured by this device appear less reliable
Summary_cn:
PhysioFlow/Manatec生物医学

PhysioFlow CES 2024

- 高清阻抗心动描记术中心脉搏和外周血管功能的最新进展
- 提供中心收缩压、舒张压和外周血管功能的关键指标
- 连续监测心率、射血量、心输出量、射血量指数、心输出量指数、室射出时间、收缩性指数、射出分数、左心工作指数、舒张末容积、早舒张充盈比、全身血管阻力及全身血管阻力指数
- 在休息、亚极限运动和高强度间歇运动中评估内研究者可靠性和一致性
- 心率、射血量、心输出量、左心工作指数和舒张末容积在不同活动类型和强度下表现出良好的可靠性水平
- 该设备测量的其他变量可靠性较低
